answers.answer: Thanks for the suggestion. This has been suggested many times in this forum and it's definitely on our list. We'll let you know when it's available.

Hi,We just released a new Diabetes tracker today. You can get it in the Diabetes community at:http://www.medhelp.org/forums/show/46. We're going to be adding to this over the next few weeks, so please let us know your feedback. Thanks!MedHelp

question: How about a glucose tracker for diabetics and hypoglycemics. :)
title: New Tracker
